files.description: Provides a shared repo-relative OUTPUT_DIR with optional environment override plus helper functions to create and resolve output paths consistently across scripts and agents.

files.description: Pytest that scans generated artifacts/logs to fail on any absolute '/outputs' path occurrences and asserts expected key artifacts are created under the repo './outputs/' directory.

Summary: Added a pytest that enforces artifacts live under ./outputs/ and rejects any absolute '/outputs' path occurrences in logs/artifacts.

est_pipeline_outputs_schema.py", "tests/test_pipeline_runnable.py", "tests/test_repro_json_pipeline_import_and_run.py", "tests/test_reproducibility.py", "tests/test_results_schema.py", "tests/test_results_schema_validation.py", "tests/test_stability.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a pytest that asserts artifacts exist under ./outputs and fails if any scanned artifact/log contains an absolute '/outputs' path.

missionDescription: Audit the repo for any agent-/script-specific output paths, refactor them to use a shared OUTPUT_DIR helper (repo-relative, env override allowed), then add/extend a pytest that fails if any artifact/log contains an absolute '/outputs' path and verifies key artifacts appear under ./outputs/.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
